name: Smart-IT Group
tagline: Gateshead IT Support and Services Company
description:
Smart IT are one of the North East's leading suppliers of IT services, telecommunications and Print Management services. Based in Team Valley, Gateshead, Smart IT has a proven track record of successfully delivering IT solutions across a broad range of industries throughout the UK.
Although typically we focus on businesses with between 50 and 250 workstations and servers, our portfolio ranges from working on some of the largest IT networks in the North East to simple one-off PC/server repairs.
